title: Boris Johnson – 2020 Comments on Tackling Flooding
author: admin
summary: The text of the comments made by Boris Johnson, the Prime Minister, on 14 July 2020.
content:
Last winter I saw for myself the misery and upheaval that flooding can bring to lives and livelihoods and I said we would do more to help people.
